title: TCS, Infosys, HCL Tech to Consider Paying Final Dividend Along With Q4 Results. Know Details - News18
content: TCS, Infosys, HCL Tech to Consider Paying Final Dividend Along With Q4 Results. Know Details  News18
description: Tata Consultancy Services, Infosys, and HCL Tech, the major Information Technology (IT) behemoths, are considering paying a final dividend. Know details
